titles.title: Military Mental Health Stigma Reduction Act
Military Mental Health Stigma Reduction Act

To amend the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2020 to direct the Secretary of Defense to include a description of programs to address and reduce the stigma associated with seeking assistance for mental health or suicidal thoughts in a report.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Military Mental Health Stigma Reduction Act
This bill requires the Department of Defense, as part of required reports concerning suicide among members of the Armed Forces, to include a description of military programs that address and reduce the stigma associated with seeking assistance for mental health or suicidal thoughts.
